Compelled to repeat specific actions/Vivid hallucinations/Extreme paranoia/Completely disgusted by something normal/Lose a portion of eyesight/Cannot look at certain items/Gain retrograde amnesia/Gain anterograde amnesia/Gain a compulsion to drink/Becomes a kleptomaniac/Desires to imitate others/Sees people who are not there/Hears voices that are not there/Gains a compulsion to lie/Believes they are being followed/Becomes extremely paranoid/Becomes extremely selfish/Becomes extremely narcissistic/Gains an extreme bloodlust
